translation.it: fosse la cosa peggiore che mi potesse succedere…

translation.en: Until I watched my brother die.
translation.it: finché non ho visto morire mio fratello.

translation.en: Amara.
Please.
Put the gun down.
[Ahanna in Igbo] Please.
I didn’t know you were pregnant.
I only just found out this morning. Nze told me this morning. I swear to God.
translation.it: L'ho scoperto stamattina. Me l'ha detto Nze. Lo giuro su Dio.

translation.en: Put the gun down.
[in Igbo] Adaugo, stay in the car, please. Stay in the car!
translation.it: Adaugo, resta in macchina, per favore. Resta in macchina!

translation.en: [in Igbo] Please. Please, please. Please don’t shoot. Please don’t kill him.
translation.it: Ti prego, non sparare. Per favore, non ucciderlo.

translation.en: I loved him too. Amara, Nze was my brother, you know.
translation.it: Anch'io gli volevo bene. Amara, Nze era mio fratello, lo sai.

translation.en: I'm sorry.
[boy] Mum, come on.
Guess what? I won the game.
Just stop... Keep playing.
Okay? Keep playing, we'll be with you shortly. We love you!
translation.it: Continua a giocare. Tra poco saremo con te. Ti vogliamo bene.

translation.en: You have a child?
Which do you prefer?
Freedom
or love?
Love.
Wrong answer.
[Adaugo] I...I love you.
God why!!!
There are key moments in one's life.
translation.it: Ci sono momenti cruciali nella vita

translation.en: That shape the core of who you are.
translation.it: che danno forma a ciò che siamo.

translation.en: Who you become.
This... would be my son's first.
translation.it: Questo era il primo per mio figlio.

translation.en: His first memory.
Subtitled by: Anu Akiyode
